summary: This document provides a financial summary of the Haze Trust account for the period from August 1, 2013, to August 31, 2013. It details asset allocation, market values, and portfolio activity, including changes in investment value and distributions.
keyFacts: The Haze Trust account had a beginning market value of $22,319,538.96 and an ending market value of $22,176,794.05.
The account experienced a change in value of ($142,744.91) during the reporting period.
The asset allocation was 30% in equity and 70% in cash and fixed income.
There were no net contributions or withdrawals during the current period.
The document is marked as confidential pursuant to Federal Rule of Criminal Procedure 6(e).
